website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an attractive pair of Vans for casual wear, these classic slip-ons are worth a look; but they aren't the best choice for serious skateboarders.
pros: An easy-to-wear shoe by a top name in skate shoes – simply slip them on and go
Attractive style is versatile for skateboarding and casual wear
cons: Material has the tendency to separate from soles
Finding the proper size can be challenging
Some authenticity concerns, but many more happy customers

customer_reviews.title: They look good... if you get sent a matching pair
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a size 11.5 left and a size 11 right. Terrible. That should be the first thing you check for when selling shoes! They look great, the colors really pop, but are quite a snug fit even when ordering a size up. Doesn't matter because I won't be able to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Returning.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my daughter. Returning. Have to pay restocking fee....Disappointed Update. From 69.00$ received 55.20$ Terrible experience. Not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: The devil is in the details! These shoes ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: The Vans Sk8 Hi, in general, is a great shoe with classic styling and a comfortable fit. BUT these shoes go even beyond the standard Vans shoe. They have Deadpool all over and inside them. You would think Vans would stop at the outside of the shoe, but you'd be wrong. Check out the insoles and the Chimi-effing-changas on the inside! Needless to say, I should have worn both white and brown pants when I opened these. Now I'm waiting on the laundry to finish my load. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Raybgd

customer_reviews.title: Vans Checkerboard Slip-Ons
customer_reviews.text: Authentic, and true to size in both width and length. Zero arch support for those over forty. These Vans slay me; the checkerboard style reminds me of high school, 5,000 years ago, and dancing with the Italian Formula One team in Long Beach 4,000 years ago. That's right, I'm having a mid-life crisis and Vans helps assuage my desires.
customer_reviews.author: BanTrophyHunting

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look exactly the same as the ones I bought at the store
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected but they look a little different from the ones I bought at the store. Also the ones that I have were made at Dominican Republic, the ones that I ordered in amazon were made in China, I don't know if that has something to do. I'm sending three photos so you can also look at the differences of the ones I bought at the store and the ones I bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fun shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fun shoes! These are very comfy and fit true to size. I wear a 12 and, without socks these are a tad big. With a pair of socks – perfect fit! I owned a pair of these (black/white checker pattern) for many years and they held up well. I look forward to getting a lot of use from this pair as well!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Michael

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable at first. But once you break them in, they're good!
customer_reviews.text: They take a long time to get comfortable. I had blisters the first couple of times I wore them, but they are worn in now, and pretty comfortable. I will say that they have absolutely no traction on the bottom, as I almost slipped on the ​wet pavement a couple of times while wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey H.

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable and comfy Snoopy & Lucy Vans!
customer_reviews.text: I love Peanuts and anything Peanuts-related so these were a no-brainer for me. They are super comfy and adorable! I am actually a size 4.5 and since these are size 5 they are a little loose on me without socks but they don’t slip off the back of my feet or anything. If I wear thick enough socks or insert shoe sizers, they fit more snugly even with bare feet. I absolutely love these Peanuts Vans and I’m so happy I purchased them! Grab yourself or someone you love a pair! :)
customer_reviews.author: cats_meowmeow

customer_reviews.title: Classic and fit well for a unisex shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are unisex. I’m a 9-10 in women’s. It depends on the shoe and how narrow it is. I got these in an 8 unisex/ men’s and they are a tad wide. Other than that, they fit great. The white is an off white/ cream. You can really notice because the base is so white. I’ve received tons of compliments and love the look. The are extremely comfortable and my new go to slip ons, since my Roxy’s died. I’m looking forward to getting lots of mileage on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Build.  Would buy Again Fav Shoes in my Closet
customer_reviews.text: Dear Lord Almighty! Could NOT BE HAPPIER! the quality is better than i expected, which is to say ALOT. i am not easy to please when it comes to quality so these being so well made are surprising. photo included
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I may send back , but reviews said they charge 15$ restock , quality poor! Not real VANS?
customer_reviews.author: Missy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Something a little different
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13 year old for his birthday after his constant begging and pleading for a pair of checked white and black slip on Vans. I love the all black look. They stay so much cleaner! My son loves them too. They are his everyday shoes. He loves that they are a little different from what everyone else is wearing. So far ( its been 2 months) they are holding up as I would expect and seem to be just as durable as any other pair of Vans. Would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Mostly cool, I can live with it
customer_reviews.text: First off, the product I selected was not what I was delivered. I selected the color that I wanted, but the thumbnail showed up different in the order section. However, the shoes that arrived were a different color scheme, but were the same model. I didn't return them because they were cheap and comfortable. If you buy from this seller, pay attention to the thumbnail photo. Because that's what you are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY NORTON

customer_reviews.title: Look good to feel good
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Personally, I’m a devout converse girl. My daughter joined the other side and absolutely loves her first pair of Vans. She wears an 8.5 woman’s and bought the 7.5 men’s. She has wide feet and has trouble finding comfort with sneakers. The joy on her face as she slid her first foot in was pure. Lol. And heaven help us if that sticker didn’t come too. I honestly don’t know which was better for her! Quality shoes. You know, if you swing that way.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Halfacre

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Ordered a boy's size 5 to fit my daughter's size 6.5 shoe size. Fits perfectly. Immediately put 3 coats of Scotchguard to hopefully keep clean for a long time. Fast shipping too! She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Queen

customer_reviews.title: Tentatively, a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: I just have to get up the courage to wear them when I go out for lunch or shopping other than for groceries. The fit is spot on, the shoes are comfortable. Too bad Vans does not carry them in Toronto, or the black and purple ones which are essentially sold out. Next year I shall order sooner. My concern is the number of negative comments in the feedback section. According to some of them, these fall apart quickly; I''ll be happy with one season..
customer_reviews.author: One singular sensation...

customer_reviews.title: Fits a half a size to a size large
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a 15 for my husband. Because his feet are so large (canoes I tell him) we have to order almost all of his shoes online. He is always a 15- these came and we were so excited! However, when he tried them on they were at least a half a size to a size too large. We tried to return them for a smaller size, but they didn't have any 14 or 14.5s in stock. Great looking shoe, just not at all sized like we have seen others sized.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Vans! Also, keep in mind that Vans run small, so order a size bigger! (I am a 9, and had to order a 10) not the sellers fault!
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Breann Pastrano

customer_reviews.title: So white you will need shades to look down
customer_reviews.text: Vans good ol classic slip-on deck shoe in hyper white. These are so white you will need shades to look down (even the soles are white). Just don’t eat pizza or drink Frappuccino while wearing them or you’ll be bummed. Seriously though, if you wanna look like your in a Nautica ad then these are the shoes for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe for busy kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them. This is high praise for these shoes, since he has never really had any fashion sense and has been willing to wear raggedy tennis shoes with holes in them. He says they are comfortable and slightly off-beat (which works well for him). I also bought a black pair for him, and he wore them both within the first two days.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of Boys

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I placed it on my back porch to stop the annoying barking of my next door neighbors dogs and so far so good. I t is probably 50-60 feet from our shared fence where the dogs congregate to bark at us whenever we are in our backyard. Since putting it to work the dogs barking has lessened.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love? These shoes fit great and go with everything. Now that I have my neutral pair, I intend to buy a couple more in more fun patterns/colors. ~the wifey
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Dogs still bark, even on the highest setting. I can hear a high pitched sound but the dogs don't seem to be phased. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Rob. B

customer_reviews.title: I loved the shoes when I got them as I've always ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes when I got them as I've always wanted a pair of Vans Slip On shoes. For some reason though after wearing them for only two months they started getting holes where my big toes are (and no I don't have crazy long toenails or anything), the backs of them broke down pretty quickly for being slip on shoes and the tread on the bottom wore fast.
customer_reviews.author: DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers! Comfortable and the fit is right.Ladies they are men's sized so follow the size chart.The price was so reasonable.I hate to pay too much for sneakers since I only wear them for travel or some weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Classic Vans
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a classic, they got me through many situations, I have many memories. No arch support but that’s to be expected of Vans... color is accurate compared to the photo and these shoes are not stiff compared to my other vans made of a thicker material. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: This new style of Vans has a very slight padded ...
customer_reviews.text: This new style of Vans has a very slight padded rim around the shoe opening, and when you combine that with the plastic trim, that's no bueno. It makes it really tight to get your foot into. It also rubs the hell out of my heel. Blister city. I wear these way less often than the style that doesn't have the padded rim.
customer_reviews.author: inger klekacz

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: I always by Vans on Amazon but they always come from a third party but for the convenience love them But this time the shoes came today and the box and the inside of shoe read 5.0 I have bought over 20 pairs of vans these were missed marked on boxed and inside of shoe and they had been worn Very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes- fit as expected- highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 13 year old son for his birthday. He loved them. We got the off white checked ones. They fit as expected. We did get a half a size bigger than he needed as he is a growing boy....Oops, I mean teenager! These are super cute for a boy or girl and very popular right now. Bottom line: they fit as expected and were exactly what we expected. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Harris

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I placed the device on my deck railing directly pointed at 3 little dogs (or sometimes just one) that incessantly bark and it made no difference in their barking. I held it and pointed it right at them and it did nothing. I could see the light go on when the dogs barked and it made a little buzz sound - dogs kept barking.
customer_reviews.author: GemArt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Rubbed a sore in my heel first day I wore them. I wear 8.5 and they are big. Should have gotten an 8. I’m disappointed. 😞
customer_reviews.author: pomlover89

customer_reviews.title: Over priced spotted shoes
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with stain on it... rather pricy for material and condition receivedl....
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Love these Vans!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 13 year old son. This is his second pair. He loves them. The first pair were a size 8.5 that I bought him a year ago. He was still wearing them as recently as a month ago, even though he now wears a size 10! They were still fitting him comfortably because they were old and broken in. He never complained about them hurting his feet. But I decided to buy him the same pair in a size 10, and they are a perfect fit. No complaints here. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sactowngirl

customer_reviews.title: Canvas shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Van's shoes for a few years now. They are comfortable and true to size. These replaced a pair of lace up black tennis shoes I had. I try to find them on sale as they are getting pricey. I always get compliments on these shoes no matter what color they are.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had 4.5 out of 5 stars. First of all some how the reviews and the product do not correlate in any way and this thing is the chinciest thing I have ever seen. Worked one time and then stopped. Not worth the money. It's a scam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving my Lucy and Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I will say they get dirty quickly but I love them no less. I haven’t washed them yet so I can’t advise how that works out. I’m a huge Peanuts fan and these are perfect to show my love for the comic strip. Plus VANS show off my sexy ankles so then there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: These runs small best to order at least a half size larger than what you buy at the store
customer_reviews.text: Thisohoknoz I was disappointed not in the shoe but they are way too small I wear 8 and 1/2 regular and a 9 is always too big and most shoes so that's what I ordered but way too small order a size and a half to one full size bigger and you be happy
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: IMO, these shoes are too uncomfortable to walk in for any length of time. They're a bit crowded in the toe box (my toes rub). The insoles provide no arch support, very little cushion and can't be removed. But they're too small to put another insole inside.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product name and description
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was the ordinary canvas slip-on shoe which does not include any suede as suggested by the product name and description.
customer_reviews.author: uhnonimuss

customer_reviews.title: Great Support.
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for this style of shoes for years. Finally I got the shoe style I was looking for. Great product. Good support. I wanted a white colored shoe but some how a black colored was ordered so support changed the color before shoe was shiped.
customer_reviews.author: MrLee123

customer_reviews.title: I wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes specifically for the gym. (Doing squats with a flat base sole helps my stance tremendously) But, I find myself wearing them for everything. Around town, out to dinner, and of course the gym. BEST THING ABOUT THESE SHOES THOUGH, are that most of the time when I do not wear socks with my Vans my achilles tendon gets a nasty blister from the back of the shoe, but NOT this one. Perfectly comfortable to wear without socks. They also fit exactly the way I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Rubs a bit more in the heel than the previous pair of Vans of this same type--they didn't need any breaking in, and this new pair does seem to need a breaking in period. That might vary by color choice or even individual pair of shoes though, as it is a subtle difference. I am just disappointed because they are not as comfy immediately as my previous pair. However, overall they seem fine, and the fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: No response dirt on back of shoe as if someone tried them on
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine just what I wanted but when it arrived it had dirt marks on both shoes on the back as if someone tried them on before boxing it so I contacted seller and got no response its been almost a month since I had them and I have not heard back from the seller had to buy some new ones from somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money For Something Else
customer_reviews.text: This device had no effect on the neighbors dogs. The green light came on to test but their dogs had no response when set at any level. No ears up or hesitation. Total waste of money...... : (
customer_reviews.author: The not so old guy

customer_reviews.title: They got here in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected. Took a while to get here though. NP
customer_reviews.author: autryfan1

customer_reviews.title: And while these are pretty much holding up well
customer_reviews.text: They get 4 stars, because they have Darth Vader, otherwise it would be 3. Previous Vans I have owned were practically indestructible, And while these are pretty much holding up well, the insoles fall apart pretty quick. And this isn't the first pair of Vans where I've had this problem. Quality has slipped. Don't get me wrong, I still love Vans and will buy a pair again, but it'll be a while (hoping quality control goes back up).
customer_reviews.author: Max Sundeen

customer_reviews.title: The worst!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, horrible, horrible. The quality is terrible. The moment I took it out the package to place it on my screen it cracked. Then after 2 days of use ONLY 2 days the other screen slid off the phone and also cracked. It also leaves your finger prints on it all smudged as well. Worst product I have bought do far. It deserves a zero.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I wished it worked better
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t spent much time training, and the device does not stop the barking all of the time. Actually I have only tried using it indoors.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: great Vans, great fit
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a gift for our son and they are typical Vans quality-great! He loves them and wears them daily. They fit perfectly and just the same as Vans we bought at the Vans store. We love Vans because they are sturdy and well made and all the kids love them. These are particularly great because even for band performances he can get away with wearing these since they have black soles and no laces! Prime membership ensured speedy delivery at no cost and since we got them on Amazon we saved a few bucks as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Misty Rigdon

customer_reviews.title: Son likes them.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of shoes this style and pattern I have bought for my son. He likes them so much that when a pair wears out he asks for another pair just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Chall-Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Vans fan
customer_reviews.text: I think Vans run about a half size small but other than that, I love how these fit. I got the black and charcoal slip ons and I get compliments all the time on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits as sized. Plus they are right on trend. The young girls in your life will love them
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: My teen loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Cute name brand slip on! I sprayed it with water proofing to make them stay white longer. My teenager loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bird

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black on black and received a black with white. I was in need of shoes with the vans store closed near me so I had no choice but to wear them. That’s the reason I gave two stars. I like vans and often wear them just wasn’t ready for a surprise color or I wouldn’t have payed as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Orng1

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very comfortable and stylish for a male or female. These shoes fit true to size and wont hurt your feet after extended wear. My only complaint is that initially throughout the breaking in process, they did rub my heel and cause a slight blister. Once they were broken in, I did not continue to have this problem. SPRAY THESE WITH SCOTCH GUARD OR SOMETHING SIMILAR BEFORE YOU WEAR THEM! Sorry for yelling, but I can't stress this enough, they are very white and as such they will stain.
customer_reviews.author: J-Houston

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, made well. No problems.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and wears them to school all day. They are comfortable. The arch support isn't incredible (like a running shoe) but it is good (better than other similarly designed tennis shoes). They fit as expected (She got the same size she always gets with other brands.) and are well made. We would (and will) buy these again, I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: Love Vans
customer_reviews.text: These Vans are perfect. They’re clean, look just like the pictures, and came in the real Vans box with the Vans sticker that I love (it’s on the tag). I’m a size 6 but can sometimes fit in 5 - 5.5’s ...I bought the 6’s and they fit exactly perfectly!! So I’d say get your truest size. These shoes rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these after researching for the most effective bark deterrent. They have not worked from day one. I reached out tot he seller with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Kipplyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Fit runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, hate the sizing. These shoes are not comfortable due to the size being too small. I wear 11 and a half or 12 in all other shoes. Pretty sure it would take a 14 in these to fit my foot. Too bad, they look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: iamoldschool

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are a great statement!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée loved these shoes! He had a pair back in the 80's! I accidently hit buy twice and the seller refunded my monies quickly on return if that 2nd pair. Excellent customer service and a great product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Midnight

customer_reviews.title: Defective Stock
customer_reviews.text: This is not the true Vans shoe! they are selling there defective stock The shoe is to small I ordered a size 14
customer_reviews.author: Lnandez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes but marvel box was severely damaged
customer_reviews.text: The marvel box the shoes came in was severely damaged sadly . But My daughter loved them and now Acts as if they are the only pair of shoes she owns! Great buy, happy daughter, satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!...Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this shoe brand and style. I had not bought this exact shoe because I was skeptical about the idea that Amazon was out of the men's size 9.5, yet had the W11.0/M9.5. Double checking on the Vans website, helped me to feel comfortable as they sell this shoe with this same sizing on their site. Perfect fit, exactly as the last time we ordered this style/color directly from Vans. The only difference, the reduced price that amazon offers. Great purchase!...Love these!
customer_reviews.author: MellowHamlet

customer_reviews.title: Received a possible return pair
customer_reviews.text: Shoes had no tags and it appears as though they had been worn and one of them dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Ezzie4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly. Feel good on all day.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Dad who is very fussy about his deck shoes but never wore Vans. He loves them. He's a 10M and I just ordered them, had them sent to his house and he actually sent me an email thanking me. (never sends an email). He had major foot surgery on both feet at 17 years old and has been fussy about all his shoes ever since. He's 86 and still walking.
customer_reviews.author: TheMeemster

customer_reviews.title: Vans. Can't lose.
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with slip-on Vans for Christmas! He wears a 9.5 so in Vans he gets a 10. The black with flames are awesome. Was going to get the plain black til I saw this. They go great with his red Fender.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to stop dogs from barking while on the deck. It was delivered next day, looks good, the weather has been to stormy, high winds preventing favorable conditions yet to see how well it works. I'll post another review in a week...
customer_reviews.author: M gobbi

customer_reviews.title: Great classic shoes but size up a bit
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic looking, classic Vans. I ordered the grey/black checkerboard for my 10-year-old and he loves them. He wears a 6 in Adidas shoes but he needed a 6.5 in these (and may even have been able to get away with a 7.) Size up at least half a size.
customer_reviews.author: ljdbs

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Vans are more for style than anything. Comfort is so-so but I wear them for looks. This was the best deal I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Too adorable!
customer_reviews.text: In general, Vans run a half size small on me. I have wide feet and wear a W10 or M8.5 in most brands, but in Vans, W10.5 or M9 works best. These Peanut collab slip-ons though, I had to get in a W11 or M9.5. Not sure why, but I have two pairs, the Smack/Pearl and the Christmas tree Snoopy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cin-Yee Shih

customer_reviews.title: My husbands last pair of vans just like this were a size 10
customer_reviews.text: My husbands last pair of vans just like this were a size 10, so I purchased the 10 however this shoe is about 1" smaller than the other pair. He tried to wear them hoping they just needed to stretch but nope these are just too small. Shoe is great as descirbed, we will be ordering a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Zak and Lisette Longo

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY ❤ THESE...
customer_reviews.text: I THINK IVE BECOME OBSESSED WITH VANS AFTER BUYING THESE....MY COLLECTION IS OUTRAGEOUS & I LOVE EM. SO COMFORTABLE TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Vans kick ass!!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with these classic bangers of a sneaker- though it does takes a bit of time to break them in well!
customer_reviews.author: Matty Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected but good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought these were canvas shoes but wasn't. Word of advice, wear thin socks. My toes didn't hurt at all. Good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Vans
customer_reviews.text: I don't think Vans are the most comfortable shoe in the world but face it you buy them cause they are Vans! The more you wear them and break them in the better they feel. Def not a shoe for me for walking all day but they fill the bill.
customer_reviews.author: jacqdaniels

customer_reviews.title: SO cute and SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with these Vans. Shipping was fast and the Vans are so amazing. These will be my everyday shoes as they are super comfy and stylish; they will match with so many outfits. These are great for wide footed women too as there is plenty of room in these shoes. Fit like gloves on me and I am VERY happy with this purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but goodie
customer_reviews.text: Daughters love them, they like a wide shoe, so really a perfect fit for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Really nice n cool. Need lil breaking into
customer_reviews.text: They just need a little breaking into. I love vans and these are marvel edition making it a great addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid black Vans
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a solid black slip-on shoe for school and this one was perfect. To avoid the chance of them not fitting correctly, we did go to a local store to try on the shoe in a different color so we knew exactly what size to order.
customer_reviews.author: Claird

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and a great color.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. I wear a 10.5 men's and these are just right. Great for wearing to the airport so I can take them off quickly. Excellent for travelling, comfortable most of the day. This color scheme goes wth nearly everything.
customer_reviews.author: anthonyg

customer_reviews.title: The color was not as expected and it seems like Vans changed their product because I've been wearing this ...
customer_reviews.text: The color was not as expected and it seems like Vans changed their product because I've been wearing this model for some years now, bought a few pairs of it throughout the years always the same size, and now the shoe is much harder to put on so it feels smaller, but then after it's on, the foot moves around in the shoe. A smaller size just won't go on because the opening is too narrow. Returned the shoe and went to the store to try on a few more pairs and had the same problem. The salesperson said they're getting a lot of similar complaints lately. I loved my Vans and i hope they fix up the model.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: These run REALLY small
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a 8.5, I ordered a 9 and they didn't even come close to fitting him. Had to send back for refund and pay the return shipping :(
customer_reviews.author: Jacilynn

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size from your regular foot size,
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered the 11.5 to make room for my 11 foot,,I know new vans will stretch out over time,,but these did not,,and now I am just trying to figure out what to do with them.?,,,I think next time I will need to visit the vans shoe store in my neck of the woods in person,,This was a costly mistake I made,I love the vans shoes since I was a kid,,,but buyer beware of what you order,,Eric,,
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: So many colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES. They're so comfortable, and I've pretty much worn them every day since I've had them (a few months now) and they haven't gotten stretched out at all. I got them hella muddy one day and was easily able to clean the canvas completely. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Peighton C

customer_reviews.title: Total RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work, was set off by every little thing and never affected my dog. In addition after a week it didnt even turn on anymore. Total waste of money. I bought a less exspensive hand held version which worked great. Do not buy this its trash
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, true to size. A little pricey, but they are vans. Great for when you need something quick to throw on.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Max setting. My dog is barking at the gardener, standing right next to this piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: jpb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Peanuts pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with a slightly heavy feeling sole (fit like every other Vans of this type). Love the design. It's not too bright but it makes people stop to see what the design is...and they love it! I do too! Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Vans Unisex Classic
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes the look and fit of these. They arrived before time and in great condition. So far, the are holding up very well. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes them as they are trendy with all her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this shoes. Mothers only complaint is they should come stain guarded as they get dirty quickly and need washed frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta H

customer_reviews.title: Buy these new before they disappear to a galaxy far, far away.
customer_reviews.text: These are the 2nd greatest pair of shoes i've ever owned. Second only to a pair of lace-up Vans with yoda on them that i get to rock from time to time. These are vans, like any other, but with the power of the light and dark on their sides. Seriously though, I get a ton of compliments on these. Plus, my wife and I rock matching pairs from time to time and that brings a smile to a lot of peoples faces.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Was fav.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pair. So hard to find right now w all the hipsters. Also bought these at aroumd 50 bux. Its a shame how the priced is over inflated at this point.
customer_reviews.author: lisa benitez

customer_reviews.title: Not what we ordered
customer_reviews.text: They are the wrong ones. We ordered black on black. We received black on white. My daughter is going to keep them, cuz her last ones blew out and she needs shoes. But we are highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Scheid

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she never complained about them.
customer_reviews.author: Josemiguel H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got the shoes as a gift for my brother and he loves them. Beautiful color, and he says they fit him well. He normally wears a size 12 and a half, the fans do not come in a size 12 and a half so I had to order a 13 but he said they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptilludrop

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a comfortable pair of white slip on sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable pair of white slip on sneakers. These sneaker are perfect comfortable to wear all day long.Went on vacation took them with me worn them just about the whole vacation. So if you want comfortable good quality sneaker buy these you won't be disappointed. Also they are a excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: sheila green

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great price, great fit, and a great happy daughter. She now has 3 pairs, black, checker, and denim. Ready for school and play. I'll order again when these wear out or her foot grows more. Recommend these to anyone looking for a great fitting pair of Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, But...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes, but they have very little support and aren’t very good for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These are very cool looking but painful! They are stiff with no give
customer_reviews.author: Charlcie Cagle

product_meta.title: Vans Men's Embossed Suede Slip-On Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Vans he Embossed Suede Classic Slip-On features sturdy low profile slip-on suede uppers, padded collars, elastic side accents, and signature rubber waffle outsoles.
